snippet: A United Nations report cites widespread shortages of food, water, electricity, jobs, hospital beds and classrooms amid an exploding population in an area of Gaza.
abstract: Gaza City Journal; United Nations report cites widespread shortages of food, water, electricity, jobs, hospital beds and classrooms amid an exploding population in what it refers to as the Forgotten Neighborhood in southern Gaza City; about 40 families have settled over the past four years in the area, while much of the surrounding strip has seen a building boom since Israel eased its restrictions two years ago.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations report cites widespread shortages of food, water, electricity, jobs, hospital beds and classrooms amid an exploding population in an area of Gaza.

headline.seo: ‘Forgotten Neighborhood’ Underscores Growing Poverty of Gaza
headline.main: ‘Forgotten Neighborhood’ Underscores the Poverty of an Isolated Enclave
headline.print_headline: ‘Forgotten Neighborhood’ Underscores the Poverty Of an Isolated Enclave
